name: Easy Cut Studio Version 5 Project
summary: An ECS5 file is a project created by version 5 of Craft Edge Easy Cut Studio, an app for creating designs to be cut out by electronic cutting machines. It stores a design layout, including graphics, shapes, text, pencil or pen drawings, paintbrush strokes, or shapes. After creating your design, you can export it to various formats with Easy Cut Studio, including .JPEG and .SVG .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
